excerpt: "Amazon Augmented AI (Amazon A2I) is now a HIPAA eligible service. Amazon A2I makes it easy to build the workflows required for human review of machine learning (ML) predictions. HIPPA eligibility applies to AWS Regions where the service is available and means you can use Amazon A2I add human review of"
